alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 10:46AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of south central Idaho, including the following county, Fremont. * WHEN...Until 200 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1045 AM MDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 0.75 and 1.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ashton, Marysville, Henrys Lake, Parker, Drummond, Ashton Reservoir, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Ponds Lodge, Chester, Shotgun Village, Macks Inn, St Anthony, Island Park Village, Egin, Warm River, Ashton Hill, Harriman State Park, Mesa Falls State Park and Big Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
